Phalanx_Fighting.help: Your coordination with other shield users grants you all enhanced protection.
Phalanx_Fighting.attackerHit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Energized_Shield.help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
Energized_Shield.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)

Push_Back.help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Slash.help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

Slice.help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Slice.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

Hack.help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hack.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

Pilum.help: You throw a pilum at a foe, dealing heavy damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Shout_of_Command.help: By bouncing a carefully pitched sound wave off an ally's ear drum, you can free him from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, or Immobilize effects, and leave him resistant to such effects for a good while. Protection will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Clarity also provides your ally enhanced perception. Recharge: Fast
Shout_of_Command.shortHelp: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Terrorize, Confusion), +Perception
Shout_of_Command.targetHelp: The soothing waves of sound clear your mind of all Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.
Shout_of_Command.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power, and improve his Perception.
Shout_of_Command.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Punch.help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.
Punch.targetHelp: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Hurl.help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.targetHelp: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

Resistance.help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation
Resistance.targetHelp: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
Resistance.targetShortHelp: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

Haymaker.help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.
Haymaker.targetHelp: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Unyielding.help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF
Unyielding.targetHelp: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.targetShortHelp: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF
Unyielding.attackerHit: You now resist Damage, Knockback and Disorientation with your {PowerName}, but your Defense is reduced.

Knockout_Blow.help: The Hero has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.
Knockout_Blow.targetHelp: The Hero has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Foot_Stomp.help: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
Foot_Stomp.targetHelp: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Unstoppable.help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.shortHelp: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.targetHelp: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.targetShortHelp: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

messages.victimHit: Your {PowerName} power has left you exhausted.

Death_Throw.help: Activating this power channels the power of the Netherworld to weaken your foes, in an attempt to revive all nearby fallen allies. You must stand near your defeated allies to revive them, then select a foe. The selected foe and all nearby foes will be Slowed, Disoriented, and drained of some life. Revived allies will have full Hit Points and Endurance and will suffer no ill effects and is left protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Death_Throw.shortHelp: Ranged (AoE), Minor DMG(Negative), Target Slow, -Recharge, Disorient, Ally Rez
Death_Throw.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Howling Twilight.
Death_Throw.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced {PlayerDest} attack rate and movement speed.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduces the Attack rate, and Regeneration rate of {PlayerDest}!

Portal.targetHelp: Nicti energy entities will continue to spawn from this Shadow Crystal until it is destroyed.

Sunless_Mire.help: Sunless Mire can drain the essence of all nearby foes, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
Sunless_Mire.shortHelp: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe -Recharge, -SPD; Self +DMG, +To Hit
Sunless_Mire.targetHelp: Your attack rate and Running speed have been reduced by the Sunless Mire.

Pilum.help: You throw a pilum at a foe, dealing heavy damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Shout_of_Command.help: By bouncing a carefully pitched sound wave off an ally's ear drum, you can free him from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, or Immobilize effects, and leave him resistant to such effects for a good while. Protection will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Clarity also provides your ally enhanced perception. Recharge: Fast
Shout_of_Command.shortHelp: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Terrorize, Confusion), +Perception
Shout_of_Command.targetHelp: The soothing waves of sound clear your mind of all Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.
Shout_of_Command.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power, and improve his Perception.
Shout_of_Command.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.

Energized_Shield.help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
Energized_Shield.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Energized_Shield.attackerHit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Phalanx_Fighting.help: Your body resonates a mild Dampening Field that absorbs kinetic energy from physical weapons. This auto power permanently reduces all incoming Smashing and Lethal damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Push_Back.help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Slash.help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

Slice.help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Slice.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Whirling_Sword.help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Sword.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Ebon_Eye.help: You can emit a beam of dark energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Negative Energy damage. Ebon Eye can also slow your target's attack rate and movement speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Ebon_Eye.targetHelp: Your attack rate and Running speed have been reduced by the Ebon Eye.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Sunless_Mire.help: Sunless Mire can drain the essence of all nearby foes, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
Sunless_Mire.targetHelp: Your attack rate and Running speed have been reduced by the Sunless Mire.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Dark_Matter_Detonation.help: You hurl a blast of Dark Matter that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. All affected targets' have their attack rate and movement speed slowed. Some foes may be knocked down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dark_Matter_Detonation.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD
Dark_Matter_Detonation.targetHelp: Your attack rate and Running speed have been reduced by the Dark Matter Detonation.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Essence_Drain.help: You tap the primal forces of your Nictus power to create an Essence Draining conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to you. Foes drained in this manner have their attack rate and movement speed reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Essence_Drain.targetHelp: Your attack rate and Running speed have been reduced by the Essence Drain.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You gain {Damage} hit points from your {PowerName}!

Gravitic_Emanation.help: Gravitic Emanation sends bolts of dark Nictus energy to multiple targets within a cone area in front of the caster. Gravitic Emanation deals only minor Negative Energy damage to each affected foe, but knocks them back, leaving them Disoriented and with reduced attack rate and movement speed. Damage: Minor. Recharge: Slow
Gravitic_Emanation.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Minor DMG(Negative), Foe Disorient, Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD
Gravitic_Emanation.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented by the Gravitic Emanation. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced as well.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Shout_of_Command.help: By bouncing a carefully pitched sound wave off an ally's ear drum, you can free him from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, or Immobilize effects, and leave him resistant to such effects for a good while. messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.

Healing_Aura.help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.

Heal_Other.help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.

Resurrect.help: The Surgeon can resurrect a fallen comrade.
Resurrect.targetHelp: The Surgeon can resurrect a fallen comrade.

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
